docs.title: Online Help
docs.text: Welcome! Use the sidebar or search to find topics.

docs.title: How to create a Free account in Zoom
docs.text:
To create a free Zoom account, follow the step-by-step instructions given below:

  1. Go to www.zoom.com
  2. Click on the Sign Up Free button on the top-right side of the page.
  3. Enter your birth year. Click Continue.
  4. Enter your email address. Click Continue.
  5. Enter the verification code sent to your email address. Click Verify.
  6. Enter your full name and set a new passowrd. Click Verify.
  7. Click Continue to finish creating your account.
Frequently asked Questions

docs.title: 1. How do I sign up for Zoom?
docs.text: You can sign up for a free Zoom account at www.zoom.com

docs.title: 3. How do I join a Zoom meeting?
docs.text: You can join a meeting by clicking the meeting link or going to join.zoom.us and entering in the meeting ID.
